review.title: “Great people”
review.pros: Pros – Small company with flexible hours where one person can make a big impact. Very friendly work environment.
review.cons: Cons – Horrible benefits, different business units have difficultly working together causing mass duplication of efforts. Small company, so there is not much room to rise. Owned by a foreign company who sometimes makes weird management decisions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More competitive salaries, fix the interdepartmental issues, improve employee benefits.

review.title: “Unique and educational”
review.pros: Pros – Relaxed atmosphere. Managment is conversational.
review.cons: Cons – working in a field type atmosphere. I prefer working downtown. Administrative duties were not delegated to the correct people.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Create a new benefit package. Have the corporate office act like one, and not like a field office. Analyst should not have to clean the kitchens and change out lightbulbs.

review.title: “Past working experience”
review.pros: Pros – no work politic to worry about. small company so it's very easy going.flexible schedule when working in officefriendly co-worker.
review.cons: Cons – one position in a department. not much area for advance.poor salary improvement.depends on the postion, some require a lot of traveling
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The company itself is very friendly and nice to their employees.However, salary is often lower than other company while expected to know everything.
